T02D2334:278b-1: pra ti patti s'a ra sha ta kam /
T02D2334:278b-3: go bar byed pa snying po brgya pa /
T02D2334:278b-4: dpal rdo rje he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2334:278b-5: gang zhig shin tu phul byung chos kun mnyam nyid rang bzhin yang //
T02D2334:278b-6: rdo rje rnam par sgeg mo rnams kyis dgyes par gyur pa rgyal //
T02D2334:278b-7: sprul pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa mang mdzad dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dpal //
T02D2334:278b-8: he ru ka dpal mnyam med de yi zhabs la brten par bgyi //
T02D2334:278b-9: gang gis dmigs pa rnams kyis khengs pas rlom pa lta'i //
T02D2334:278b-10: mang po'i rtog 'di 'bras bu las ni spangs gyur kyang //
T02D2334:278b-11: shin tu mdzes pa'i dga' bar yongs bsgyur ched du ji lta'i don //
T02D2334:278b-12: go bar byed pa'i snying po ston pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2334:278b-13: kun du rtog med ma 'dres pa //
T02D2334:278b-14: skye ba med cing thogs pa med //
T02D2334:278b-15: dor dang bsags pa spangs pa yi //
T02D2334:278b-16: sems ni kye yi rdo rje nyid //
T02D2334:278b-17: sna tshogs sprul pa'i gzugs rnams su//
T02D2334:278b-18: sna tshogs mos pa rnam rtog pa //
T02D2334:278b-19: rang gis rang bzhin rtogs pa yis //
T02D2334:278b-20: rang gi ngo bo mos med nyid //
T02D2334:278b-22: rnam pa ma lus 'od gsal ba //
T02D2334:278b-23: dag pa ye shes lnga rang bzhin //
T02D2334:278b-24: bla med dba' rlabs med pa'o //
T02D2334:278b-25: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2334:278b-26: 'di ltar lha yi gzugs su ste //
T02D2334:278b-27: ma lus dga' ba yang dag rdzogs //
T02D2334:278b-28: nyon mongs ma lus 'jig byed pa //
T02D2334:278b-29: gzugs la sogs 'di de bzhin nyid //
T02D2334:278b-30: ji lta'i rnam par rnam gnas pa //
T02D2334:278b-31: gzung bya min par rab rtogs bya //
T02D2334:278b-32: rtogs pa de 'di mtshan nyid bral //
T02D2334:278b-33: chos rnams kun gyi snying po ni //
T02D2334:278b-34: stong nyid gcig pu de min pas //
T02D2334:278b-35: dkyil 'khor de nyid yang dag rig / rnam pa kun du mtshan nyid bral //
T02D2334:278b-36: rtsa rnams thams cad mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2334:278b-37: phung po lnga yang dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D2334:278b-38: dngos po thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D2334:278b-39: bsam med rdo rje can gyi thugs //
T02D2334:278b-40: thams cad du yang sku rnams dang //
T02D2334:278b-41: de bzhin rigs rnams kun kyang de //
T02D2334:278b-42: phyag rgya mtshan ma la sogs rnams //
T02D2334:278b-43: de ni de lta de ltar rol //
T02D2334:278b-44: thams cad du ni snyoms 'jug de //
T02D2334:278b-45: bde ba chen po'i dga' ston ro //
T02D2334:278b-46: rdo rje can gzugs phun tshogs pa //
T02D2334:279a-2: phung po rnams de khams rnams de //
T02D2334:279a-3: skye mched rnams kyang de rnams nyid //
T02D2334:279a-4: thams cad ro gcig snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D2334:279a-5: rdo rje can gyi rnam 'phrul lo //
T02D2334:279a-6: rdo rje can 'di de rnams dang //
T02D2334:279a-7: de dag rnams kyang rdor can las //
T02D2334:279a-9: gsal zhing rnyog med rten med pa'o //
T02D2334:279a-10: gang du sems la rnam pa mtha' dag snang zhing gsal bar 'phro ba mnyam pa nyid gyur dang //
T02D2334:279a-11: sems dang sems las byung ba'i dbye ba rnam par nyams shing thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyur pa //
T02D2334:279a-12: der ni mchog gi bde ba chen po'i ro yis dbang bskur ba las bdag nyid rab dang zhing //
T02D2334:279a-13: dkyil 'khor dang ni dkyil 'khor pa yi mdzes pa chen po ci yang 'phro ba nyid du mthong //
T02D2334:279a-14: rnam dag rtog pa'i rdul gyis mnyes pa las //
T02D2334:279a-15: kun nas dang zhing shin tu 'od gsal ba //
T02D2334:279a-16: mtha' yas pa yi gzugs dang gzugs brnyan tshogs //
T02D2334:279a-17: sems kyi me long de la ci yang mdzes //
T02D2334:279a-18: ji ltar sindhur yi rdul gyis gos pa yi //
T02D2334:279a-19: me long la ni gzugs brnyan tshogs snang mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2334:279a-20: de bzhin rtog pa'i khyad par gyis ni sun phyung ba'i //
T02D2334:279a-21: yid 'di la ni rab tu gsal ba ring ba nyid //
T02D2334:279a-22: rang gzhan nyid du mngon par zhen pas rgyug par ni //
T02D2334:279a-23: kun du byas nas yid ni phyi rol yang dag 'phel //
T02D2334:279a-24: nang dang phyi rol du yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa //
T02D2334:279a-25: rang gis byas pas dub pa'i 'gro ba kye ma'o mtshar //
T02D2334:279a-26: gnyis kyi rnam pa bral bas mdzes pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2334:279a-27: ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa dga' ba'i ro yi char //
T02D2334:279a-28: rnams kyi sgeg pa chen pos mtha' dag brten gyur kyang //
T02D2334:279a-29: de lta nyid kyis dga' zhing 'ching bar mi 'gyur mtshar //
T02D2334:279a-30: gnyis kyi rnam pa dor zhing rab tu gsal //
T02D2334:279a-31: mkhas pas yang dag reg bya skal bzang la //
T02D2334:279a-32: stug po'i dga' bas khyab pa stobs chen ro yis yongs gang nam mkha'i mthil du ni//
T02D2334:279a-33: rnam pa sna tshogs 'phro ba nye bar bsags pa mtha' dag nang du son gyur pa'i //
T02D2334:279a-34: yid la 'jig rten gsum po snang ba 'di de thim pa lta bur gnas pa'o //
T02D2334:279a-35: rang gi bdag po nyid kyis gang gyur pa //
T02D2334:279a-36: de 'di rang byin rlabs pa'i rim pa ste //
T02D2334:279b-0: gnyis nyid dag las nges pa rnam grol @279b ba //
T02D2334:279b-1: rang gi sgra yis mngon par brjod pa yin //
T02D2334:279b-2: sngags dang yang dag dbab pa dang //
T02D2334:279b-3: sgeg dang bzhad pa sogs rim med //
T02D2334:279b-4: sngags min yid la byed pa dang //
T02D2334:279b-6: gang du dngos rnams rang bzhin ni //
T02D2334:279b-7: rang bzhin nyid kyi khong du chud //
T02D2334:279b-8: log pa'i rang bzhin zad pa yis //
T02D2334:279b-10: bde sdug ces bya gnyis dbye ba'i //
T02D2334:279b-11: dbye ba sbyin byed rnam rtog ste //
T02D2334:279b-12: rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa'i //
T02D2334:279b-13: dmigs med bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2334:279b-14: snang ba med cing gsal ba med //
T02D2334:279b-15: 'jug pa med cing bsam pa med //
T02D2334:279b-16: 'gro ba'i rnam pa'i tshogs rnams ni //
T02D2334:279b-17: yang dag bsags pa shel lta bu //
T02D2334:279b-18: 'gro ba rmi lam sgyu ma dang //
T02D2334:279b-19: smig rgyu sogs mtshungs nges par blta //
T02D2334:279b-20: gzung pa thams cad yongs dor las //
T02D2334:279b-21: dpyad du med pa lhun gyis grub //
T02D2334:279b-22: dngos dang dngos po med nyid kyis //
T02D2334:279b-23: stong par mthong ba kun rdzob rgyu'o //
T02D2334:279b-24: kun rdzob 'di ni don dam ste //
T02D2334:279b-25: srid pa shes pas mya ngan 'das //
T02D2334:279b-26: mtha' gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i //
T02D2334:279b-27: rtog pa'i ngo bo gzhi med pa //
T02D2334:279b-28: dor dang bsags pa spangs pa dang //
T02D2334:279b-29: zhi ba bla na med pa'o //
T02D2334:279b-30: dngos po kun la dbang phyug ni //
T02D2334:279b-31: dngos po kun la dbang phyug min //
T02D2334:279b-32: dngos kun rang bzhin nyid las ni //
T02D2334:279b-33: dngos po kun la rtag tu gnas //
T02D2334:279b-34: gnas la sogs pa gsum dbye bas //
T02D2334:279b-35: rnam pa gcig nyid gyur pa dang //
T02D2334:279b-36: chags pa med las rnam 'gyur dang //
T02D2334:279b-37: bral bas blo ni legs par gnas //
T02D2334:279b-38: ji ltar mar me kun du snang //
T02D2334:279b-39: rnam pa thams cad la 'dra ba //
T02D2334:279b-40: 'dir ni gcig dang sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2334:279b-41: don gyi blo ni yod ma yin //
T02D2334:279b-42: de bzhin sems nyid kyis ni sems //
T02D2334:279b-43: de yi gzugs brnyan bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2334:279b-44: gcig dang sna tshogs rtog pa'i blo //
T02D2334:279b-45: rnam pa snang ba'ang de dang 'dra //
T02D2334:279b-46: rnam pa de yang rnam pa med//
T02D2334:279b-47: rnam pa nyid kyis ma gzung bas //
T02D2334:279b-48: rang gi rnam rtog dor las gzhan //
T02D2334:279b-49: yod min rnam pa med pa'ang mtshon //
T02D2334:279b-50: rnam pa bcas dang rnam med ces //
T02D2334:279b-52: snam bu med na 'o na ni //
T02D2334:279b-53: dkar sogs yon tan gang du gnas //
T02D2334:279b-54: rnam bcas ma yin rnam med yin//
T02D2334:280a-0: @280a * // blo ldan sna tshogs nyid spangs pa //
T02D2334:280a-1: ji lta de bzhin yid du gyur //
T02D2334:280a-2: de yang ci zhig rtogs par byed //
T02D2334:280a-3: kye ma ji ltar rnam rtog pa //
T02D2334:280a-5: rang gi sems kyi kun du rtog / spangs pa tsam ni thar zhes bya //
T02D2334:280a-6: kakko lar ni ga bur zhu ba dri med bzang po'i ro dang 'dra min zhing //
T02D2334:280a-7: bo la yi ni rtse dga'i longs spyod rab tu gsal ba'i skal ba bzangs te 'dra yang min //
T02D2334:280a-8: ci yang gsal bya min pa 'di ni mtha' dag kun du rtog pa'i tshogs zad pa //
T02D2334:280a-9: dmigs pa med pa'i dga' ba chen po yis ni nam mkha' rab tu gang bar 'gyur /
T02D2334:280a-10: rnam par mi rtog bde ba che //
T02D2334:280a-11: 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2334:280a-12: dga' 'di bde ba'i khyim gyis ni //
T02D2334:280a-13: sgo yi them skas lta bu yin //
T02D2334:280a-14: ae ma'o bde ba ae ma'o bde chen nyid //
T02D2334:280a-15: ae ma ji ltar ji ltar longs spyod bgyi'o //
T02D2334:280a-16: zhes byar 'dod pa rtsol ba'i sems kyi ni //
T02D2334:280a-17: dga' de don du 'gro ba lta bu yin //
T02D2334:280a-18: dngos po rnams la ngo bo nyid brtags pa //
T02D2334:280a-19: stong pa nyid kyis rnam par 'joms par byed //
T02D2334:280a-20: rang bzhin med pa nyid du sbyor ba las //
T02D2334:280a-21: mchog tu dga' ba yi ni rang bzhin can //
T02D2334:280a-22: ae ma'o ye shes ae ye shes //
T02D2334:280a-23: ye shes gsal ba'i 'di ngo mtshar//
T02D2334:280a-24: zhes byar longs spyod rtsol ba'i sems //
T02D2334:280a-25: mchog tu dga' ba tsam nyid do //
T02D2334:280a-26: gang du dngos dang dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig nyid dang rnam bral rang nyid mdzes pa ste //
T02D2334:280a-27: stug por gyur pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin rab tu rtog pa chen po nam mkha'i gnas khyab cing //
T02D2334:280a-28: rgya che'i rnam pa sna tshogs can dang dri med nyid kyis me long dkyil 'khor 'phro 'dra ba //
T02D2334:280a-29: bde ba kun gyi gnas gyur lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de ni bzhi pa yin par brjod //
T02D2334:280a-30: ae ma'o bde chen rol pa yis //
T02D2334:280a-31: srid pa gsum po gang ba na //
T02D2334:280a-32: gang gis rang gzhan dbye ba 'di //
T02D2334:280a-33: skad cig gis ni dbyer med 'gro //
T02D2334:280a-34: rang gzhan tshul du mngon gsal bar //
T02D2334:280a-35: srid pa'i bur du bsgrags pa ni //
T02D2334:280a-36: kye ho bde chen char bab pas //
T02D2334:280a-37: rgyas pa'i 'gro ba dbyer med nyid //
T02D2334:280a-38: dngos rnams yod dang med nyid na //
T02D2334:280a-39: slar yang dbye bas kun du gnas //
T02D2334:280a-40: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D2334:280b-0: @280b stong nyid phyir na bde ba che //
T02D2334:280b-2: lus can thams cad rnams kyi ste //
T02D2334:280b-3: dbyer med 'di dag ye shes kyi //
T02D2334:280b-4: snang ba rnal 'byor can rnams kyi'o //
T02D2334:280b-5: shes rab ma la rlung gis bskul bas gtum mo 'bar ba rab tu gsal zhing rgya che ba //
T02D2334:280b-6: sgrib pa nyid kyi dri ma dang bral dngos po tshogs pa rnam par gcod pas 'phel ba byed //
T02D2334:280b-7: rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsregs pa na ni bdud rtsi de ni dmigs pa med //
T02D2334:280b-8: yang dag rig byed nam mkha' khyab pa dang yang dngos po mtha' dag mnyam nyid yang dag rdzogs //
T02D2334:280b-9: rang bzhin gyi ni rtsa rnams ni //
T02D2334:280b-10: de kho na las lha rnams min //
T02D2334:280b-11: 'di rnams kyi ni shin tu dang //
T02D2334:280b-12: rang bzhin med 'di rang ngo bo //
T02D2334:280b-13: shes rab thabs dag gcig nyid gang //
T02D2334:280b-14: rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig / aa wa
T02D2334:280b-15: dh'u t'i rnam gsal bdag / de ni dbu ma'i
T02D2334:280b-16: rtog par 'dod // thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag phung po skye mched khams rnams ni //
T02D2334:280b-17: dag pa'i shel ltar rab gsal ba //
T02D2334:280b-18: de ni aa wa dh'u t'i nyid //
T02D2334:280b-19: rnam pa thams cad mngon sum du //
T02D2334:280b-20: rnam pa mnyam pa mtshan nyid bral //
T02D2334:280b-21: mtshon bya mtshon byed kun spangs pa //
T02D2334:280b-22: gcig pu aa wa dh'u t'i nyid //
T02D2334:280b-23: rab tu dga' ba yang dag rtogs shing dag pa'i dpa' bo nam mkha' che //
T02D2334:280b-24: rnam kun nye bar bsags pa mtha' dag rdzogs par rtogs bya longs spyod rdzogs //
T02D2334:280b-25: dngos po'i tshogs rnams ro mnyam nyid kyis rmi lam sprul pa lta bu ste //
T02D2334:280b-26: sgrib pa zhi ba'i ye shes yul de rnam dag aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D2334:280b-27: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa //
T02D2334:280b-28: bde ba chen po zhes bya'i rim //
T02D2334:280b-29: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2334:280b-30: 'khor lo bzhi po mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2334:280b-31: grangs kyang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2334:280b-32: bgrang byar byas pa min pa las //
T02D2334:280b-33: gnyis nyid dang ni bral ba'i bdag / mnyam nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba'o//
T02D2334:280b-34: mkha' dang nye bar len pa yi //
T02D2334:280b-35: dbye bas rnam par 'gyur ba'ang med //
T02D2334:280b-36: sna tshogs rtsva dang shing bsregs na //
T02D2334:280b-37: nags su dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ci //
T02D2334:280b-38: rang bzhin de nyid las dbyer med //
T02D2334:280b-39: kun rdzob tu ni dbye ba lta //
T02D2334:280b-40: gang du kun rdzob nyid med pa //
T02D2334:280b-41: der ni don dam nyid kyi ci //
T02D2334:281a-1: rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis ni //
T02D2334:281a-2: rang bzhin med pa blo gcig pu //
T02D2334:281a-3: mo gsham bu la sogs rnams kyi //
T02D2334:281a-4: rang bzhin rnam par da pyod pa med //
T02D2334:281a-5: gzhan yang gang 'dir bshad par bya ste phra mo'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2334:281a-6: nges par de kho na nyid ma yin 'dir ni bshad pa tsam /
T02D2334:281a-7: mchog gi bde ba ro gcig dang pa yi ni rgyun snang ba //
T02D2334:281a-8: gsal bar nyams su myong ba'i snying po de nyid dmigs pas stong //
T02D2334:281a-9: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2334:281a-10: dngos rnams rtog pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02D2334:281a-11: rang bzhin med nyid gang 'di ni //
T02D2334:281a-12: chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2334:281a-13: rang gi 'dod pas bcug pa las //
T02D2334:281a-14: bag chags stobs kyis g-yos gyur pas //
T02D2334:281a-15: rnam par rtog pa skyes gyur pa //
T02D2334:281a-16: phyi rol don 'bras nyid lta bu'o //
T02D2334:281a-17: kye ho rnam bkra'i yul nyid la //
T02D2334:281a-18: rnam rtog rjes su song gyur pa //
T02D2334:281a-19: ka dam pa yi ro sgra ltar //
T02D2334:281a-20: rnam pa du ma dus gcig la'o //
T02D2334:281a-21: gcig gi dngos po nyid la yang //
T02D2334:281a-22: rnam pa sna tshogs don du rtog / de dang de yi bdag nyid med //
T02D2334:281a-23: 'dod pas nye bar brtags tsam nyid //
T02D2334:281a-24: dngos po med kyang 'khrul pa yi //
T02D2334:281a-25: sems kyi 'dod pa'ang skyes gyur pa //
T02D2334:281a-26: snga ma snga ma yid byed pa'i //
T02D2334:281a-27: 'du byed kyi ni 'bras bu'i bdag / rang gis rang bzhin ma rtogs pas //
T02D2334:281a-28: sems ni phyi rol rgyug gyur pa //
T02D2334:281a-29: phyis pas reg bya ngan pa la //
T02D2334:281a-30: reg pas rang nyid sdug bsngal bzhin //
T02D2334:281a-31: sems de rtog pa'i rnam pa ste //
T02D2334:281a-32: phyi rol don du'ang brtags pa nyid //
T02D2334:281a-33: rtog pa 'di dag spangs pa na //
T02D2334:281a-34: gcig pu nam mkha'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2334:281a-35: mi shes pas ni dngos rnams kyi //
T02D2334:281a-36: rang bzhin rang bzhin bcas pa nyid //
T02D2334:281a-37: dngos po rnams ni yongs shes pas //
T02D2334:281a-38: rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D2334:281a-39: rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams la //
T02D2334:281a-40: rang dbang gis ni thams cad byed //
T02D2334:281a-41: de yi bya ba zhig pa dang //
T02D2334:281a-42: byed pa po yang de bzhin no //
T02D2334:281a-43: bya ba dang ni byed pa yi //
T02D2334:281a-44: 'brel pa rtog pa'i dbang gis te //
T02D2334:281a-45: rang bzhin khong du chud pa las //
T02D2334:281a-46: bya med byed pa po yang med //
T02D2334:281a-47: bya ba cung zad yod min zhing //
T02D2334:281a-48: byed pa po yang de bzhin no //
T02D2334:281a-49: brda tsam thob pa 'di dag ni //
T02D2334:281a-50: byed do zhes bya byed po med //
T02D2334:281b-0: chos rnams rang bzhin med @281b nyid na //
T02D2334:281b-1: blang dang dor bya nyid ga la //
T02D2334:281b-2: rmi lam nang gi chos kun la //
T02D2334:281b-3: blang dor bya ba ji bzhin no //
T02D2334:281b-4: pha rol phyin pa thams cad rnams //
T02D2334:281b-5: de la kun nas bsten bya ste //
T02D2334:281b-6: pha rol phyin kun ye shes ni //
T02D2334:281b-7: shes rab pha rol phyin min nam //
T02D2334:281b-8: de nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i sems //
T02D2334:281b-9: lhag ma med cing gos pa med //
T02D2334:281b-10: dbang po med cing gzhi med la //
T02D2334:281b-11: spyod pa med cing 'khrugs pa med //
T02D2334:281b-12: pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di rnams //
T02D2334:281b-13: dga' ba ro gcig bdag nyid can //
T02D2334:281b-14: dga' ba yongs su shes pa ni //
T02D2334:281b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /'di rnams 'bras bu dga' ba ste //
T02D2334:281b-16: 'di rtogs rang bzhin med pa nyid //
T02D2334:281b-17: gnyis po shin tu dbyer med pa'i //
T02D2334:281b-18: dga' ba nyid ni bde ba che //
T02D2334:281b-19: shes rab snying rje gcig pa nyid //
T02D2334:281b-20: sgron ma dang ni snang ba bzhin //
T02D2334:281b-21: shes rab snying rje'i dbye ba yang //
T02D2334:281b-22: sgron ma snang ba ji bzhin no //
T02D2334:281b-23: gnyis po 'di ni dbyer med bdag /
T02D2334:281b-24: sems gcig pu ni ngo bo nyid //
T02D2334:281b-25: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid des //
T02D2334:281b-26: sems ni kyi yi rdo rje'i gzugs //
T02D2334:281b-27: dga' ba yang ni rang bzhin med //
T02D2334:281b-28: de rtogs pa yang de dang 'dra //
T02D2334:281b-29: 'di ltar kye'i rdor rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2334:281b-30: ma lus rnam par dbyer med pa'o //
T02D2334:281b-31: rnam rtog rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
T02D2334:281b-32: srid pa gsum po dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2334:281b-33: bde ba chen po'i dga' ston gyis //
T02D2334:281b-34: der ni kye yi rdo rje rol //
T02D2334:281b-35: bza' dang nyal dang rtse ba dang //
T02D2334:281b-36: dgod bzhin du yang de dang de //
T02D2334:281b-38: kye yi rdo rje'i mchod pa po'o //
T02D2334:281b-39: thams cad dus su dngos kun la //
T02D2334:281b-40: rnal 'byor pa yis dogs med spyad //
T02D2334:281b-42: gos pa med pa mya ngan 'da' //
T02D2334:281b-43: ji ltar sgyu ma shes pas sgyu ma brgya phrag ston pa na //
T02D2334:281b-44: skyo dang rab tu dga' ba mnyam pa nyid kyis ci dgar spyod //
T02D2334:281b-45: de bzhin rnal 'byor kho na rjes rtogs rang bzhin can //
T02D2334:281b-46: 'jigs pa brgyad dang bde ba 'char la'ang 'jigs dang chags pa med //
T02D2334:281b-47: 'dir ni so sor bsgom bya med //
T02D2334:281b-48: sgom pa po ni su yang med //
T02D2334:281b-49: gnyis po med phyir sgom pa'ang med //
T02D2334:281b-51: gnyis kyi rnam pa yongs dong bas //
T02D2334:282a-0: dbye ba dbyer med rnam par @282a * //
T02D2334:282a-2: / yod nyid tsam du yongs shes pas //
T02D2334:282a-3: bsgom pa yang ni skyon med pa'o //
T02D2334:282a-4: sngags bzlas la sogs 'di rnams kyang //
T02D2334:282a-5: mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can //
T02D2334:282a-6: 'gro kun lhan cig skyes ngo bo //
T02D2334:282a-7: 'di las de yang bgag pa med //
T02D2334:282a-10: / gsum gyi bdag nyid yi ge h'um //
T02D2334:282a-11: dogs med he ru ka lta bur //
T02D2334:282a-12: kun rtog kun du rmongs pa sel //
T02D2334:282a-13: rtog pa'i sgrib pa kun spangs nas //
T02D2334:282a-14: ma brtags par ni gang mthong ba'i //
T02D2334:282a-15: gsang ba de nyid sngags de rnams //
T02D2334:282a-16: dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2334:282a-17: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu la'ang //
T02D2334:282a-18: de bzhin zhi la sogs pa yi //
T02D2334:282a-19: sbyor la sngags kyis bde bar byed //
T02D2334:282a-20: dngos po'i nus pa'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02D2334:282a-21: kun rdzob tu yang mthong ba yin //
T02D2334:282a-22: kun rdzob rnam par spangs na ni //
T02D2334:282a-23: don dam zhes bya ba nyid ci //
T02D2334:282a-24: shing la sogs las byung nyid kyis //
T02D2334:282a-25: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dor mi bya //
T02D2334:282a-26: de yi rang bzhin rtogs pa des //
T02D2334:282a-27: phyag byas pa la skyon yod min //
T02D2334:282a-28: sa sogs las byung sku gzugs la sogs la //
T02D2334:282a-29: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag pos phyag mi bya //
T02D2334:282a-30: lhan cig skyes pa rtogs par gyur pa nyid //
T02D2334:282a-31: bla na med pa'i phyag ni de yin no //
T02D2334:282a-32: de bzhin du yang gtor ma'i rim pa 'di //
T02D2334:282a-33: rmi lam dang ni sprul pa lta bu ste //
T02D2334:282a-34: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid du ni //
T02D2334:282a-35: de yi 'khor gsum po rnams mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2334:282a-36: de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par //
T02D2334:282a-37: khams gsum po ni gcig tu yang dag rig / rnal 'byor rnams kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa yi //
T02D2334:282a-38: dga' ba 'di de gtor ma chen po'o //
T02D2334:282a-39: ji srid du ni byang chub bar gyi tshogs //
T02D2334:282a-40: de srid der ni dri ma rnams med pa //
T02D2334:282a-41: bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa las //
T02D2334:282a-42: shes rab pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag / rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod pa la sogs pa //
T02D2334:282a-43: bya ba thams cad kyang ni dri ma med //
T02D2334:282a-44: shes rab thabs dag yang dag sbyor ba las //
T02D2334:282a-45: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par byas pa yin //
T02D2334:282a-46: de bzhin mtha' dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni //
T02D2334:282a-47: rab tu gnas pa bla na med pa'ang de //
T02D2334:282a-48: gang du rnam dbyer med pa'i rnam pa ni //
T02D2334:282a-49: yang dag rig la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas //
T02D2334:282b-0: rol pa'i @282b chogs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i //
T02D2334:282b-1: bde ba'i tshogs rnams ci tsam pa //
T02D2334:282b-2: de tsam nyams su myong ba nyid //
T02D2334:282b-3: rnal 'byor tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02D2334:282b-4: bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2334:282b-5: rnam par sgeg pa'i sbrang rtsi'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02D2334:282b-6: ge sar mdzes pa 'bar ba'i padma yis //
T02D2334:282b-7: rdo rje'i dbang phyug la ni mchod par bya //
T02D2334:282b-8: gzugs la sogs pa lngar btags pa //
T02D2334:282b-9: za ba dam tshig chen po yin //
T02D2334:282b-10: de ni rnam dag dag pa'i bdag / rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D2334:282b-11: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yis //
T02D2334:282b-12: lhag par mos pa mi 'byung ba //
T02D2334:282b-13: gsal bar snang ba 'di de ni //
T02D2334:282b-14: rang rig bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2334:282b-15: 'ga' zhig bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i //
T02D2334:282b-16: gtam nyid kyis ni tshim mod kyang //
T02D2334:282b-17: rang gi mngon sum nyams myong ni //
T02D2334:282b-18: rol brtson pa yi rnam smin no //
T02D2334:282b-19: su zhig gzugs kyi tshogs bsdus pa //
T02D2334:282b-20: dmigs dang bcas la chags med dang //
T02D2334:282b-21: dmigs pa med par rtse gcig pa'i //
T02D2334:282b-22: mchog de rnams ni dkon pa nyid //
T02D2334:282b-23: kha cig stong pa nyid dang ni //
T02D2334:282b-24: la la sbyor ba'i rim par rmongs //
T02D2334:282b-25: su zhig bde ba cher spro ba'i //
T02D2334:282b-27: go bar byed pa'i snying po rab tu dang bas gsal byas las //
T02D2334:282b-28: bsod nams phung po dri ma med pa bdag gis gang thob pa //
T02D2334:282b-29: des ni 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba yongs bsal nas //
T02D2334:282b-30: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs mchog snying po go bar
T02D2334:282b-31: byed gyur cig / dpe la shin tu rmongs pa
T02D2334:282b-32: ro gcig gyur pa'i yid can rnams kyi dper bya
T02D2334:282b-33: rab gsal ba // gsal bar rig ba bla ma'i
T02D2334:282b-34: bla mar gyur la gal te shes rab rang bzhin
T02D2334:282b-35: rab gsal ba // can yin yang // gzhan las
T02D2334:282b-36: rtogs pa'i 'bras min rdo rje can gyi bka' lung
T02D2334:282b-37: thob pa rgyud dang rjes mthun pa //
T02D2334:282b-38: de rig pa las go byed snying po brgya pa dpal ldan 'phags pa lha yis brjod pa yin //
T02D2334:282b-39: dngos po'i yid kyi rol pa mang po'i tshogs kyis phal cher rtse ba'i ro yis ni //
T02D2334:282b-40: bsnyems pa'i rtsom pas rnam par bsgyings pa'am gus las 'jug pa ci yang rung ba spros //
T02D2334:282b-41: rnam pa thams cad don ni ji lta'i nyams kyi kun du rtog pas gzung ba las //
T02D2334:283a-0: bdag la sngon med pa zhes smra bar bya ba'am ji ltar dad pa de @283a * //
T02D2334:283a-2: go bar byed pa snying po brgya pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2334:283a-3: slob dpon chen po a'arya de ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2334:283a-5: // /'di ni shar phyogs sang+na ga ra'i gnas brtan theg
T02D2334:283a-6: pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa la
T02D2334:283a-7: dngos grub kyis brgyan pa dpal nags kyi rin po
T02D2334:283a-8: che'i zhal snga nas man ngag gi bshad pas yang
T02D2334:283a-9: dag par gsungs pa'i sgra don ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2334:283a-10: du dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rnam par
